thread.title: Brian Scalabrine is at the Celtics game wearing an atrocious lime green jacket with his face on it
thread.title_full: Brian Scalabrine is at the Celtics game wearing an atrocious lime green jacket with his face on it

author: Tim Cato
title: Brian Scalabrine is at the Celtics game wearing an atrocious lime green jacket with his face on it
text:
Of course.
Brian Scalabrine has been in broadcasting for a while now. Why he decided to wait until now to break out this incredibly gaudy jacket, I can’t tell you. But here it is, and it’s glorious and awful at the same time.
Yeah. He's wearing that. pic.twitter.com/AChF8VgE8z 
— Marc D'Amico (@Marc_DAmico) January 28, 2017 Here’s a closer look.
The best part about Scalabrine's green Scalabrine jacket is that Scalabrine is spelled wrong ... pic.twitter.com/Kmw8I1msEj 
— Ben Rohrbach (@brohrbach) January 28, 2017 Let’s note that, as the tweet points out, Scalabrine’s last name is actually spelled “Scalbrine” on the jacket. That’s amazing. He’s repping it anyway.
